wikipedia_page.main: Jonathon Colin Mark Atkinson (born 10 July 1968) was an English cricketer. He was born at Butleigh, Somerset. He played first-class and List A cricket for Somerset and Cambridge University between 1985 and 1990. He was educated at Millfield School where his father was headmaster.
